thread.title: Linda - Des Moines
thread.title_full: Groupon reviewed by Linda - Des Moines

author: Linda - Des Moines
title: Linda - Des Moines
text: I bought a 5 day parking coupon at the Airport thru Groupon, but was unable to use it. Every time we went to use the coupon, the parking lot was full. So I contacted Groupon, to explain what happened the immediately refunded me, and the money was credited to my Groupon account!! What great SERVICE!!
